column5: I have been buying lure parts from luremaking.com for years and through the years have formed a good relationship with the owner/manager Steve through some ups and downs of a few broken parts here and there, but also the great products he sells.  This year he offered to make me a set of blades, as he knows I love my photography, of any picture of mine I wanted, for free.  He said they bought a piece of equipment that lets them superimpose a picture onto a blade.  So I sent him a few of my fave pics and we agreed the Eagle I took a picture of a few years ago on Lake Nipissing turned out the best on the blade.  I received these in the mail yesterday.  #10 blades with my eagle pic.  Sweet!  Thanks Steve!!!  IMG_0109 by Joeyfishing, on Flickr
Those double 10 Eagles will look great hanging off each ear Joey, did Steve make a set for Paul's ears?
LOL, yes they certainly will    Nope, Paul will have to go naked eared, or take his own pics and make a set of his own   Maybe some clip ons as his ears are not pierced

Wow! Thats really cool of them! And a great shot as well!  I should try to get some for the wife, I deal with luremaking.com alot. Amazing service/products.  I make knecklaces with some blades, use all fishing components.
Very cool   Give them fish some AMURICAN FREEDOM!!!!!
Those eagles are going to catch fish.  Looking good.
Very nice,who would of thought?. To nice to fish with !
^^^ i agree  No way would I use those for fishing  Way too cool/nice
x3. That's the first thing I thought of. Real nice job.  Cheers

LOL, yes they certainly will    Nope, Paul will have to go naked eared, or take his own pics and make a set of his own   Maybe some clip ons as his ears are not pierced  I had to re read this post.  I thought at first you said Paul would have to be naked to put his picture on the blade.  WHEW, glad I re read.  Those are sweet J.
